Reviews.Title: DONT BUY TOSHIBA
Reviews.Author: Ms. Linda Patterson
Reviews.Content: BROKE BEFORE A YEAR OLDWARRANTY DEPT SCREWED UP THE DATE AND SHOWED THAT MY WARRANTY EXPIRED THE DAY I BOUGHT THE TVSPENT HOURS ON THE PHONE WITH TOSHIBA, AMERICAN EXPRESS AND THE STORE GETTING TOSHIBA DOCUMENTATION TO CORRECT THEIR MISTAKEI (!!!!!) HAVE TO TAKE IT DOWN OFF THE WALL AND CARRY IT DOWNSTAIRS TO MY CAR AND DRIVE 4 HOURS R/T TO GET THIS TO A SERVICE PLACEDON'T DON'T DONT BUY TOSHIBA PRODUCTS

ProductInfo.Features:
Audyssey Premium Television - A suite of advanced audio technologies that include Audyssey Dynamic EQ and Audyssey Bass Extension (ABX)
DynaLight automatically adjusts the backlight intensity based on the image content.
Gaming mode - Enhances the gaming experience by reducing game controller delay
Unit Dimensions - 38.8W x 3.9D x 23.8H
Table stand included
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba 40E220U 40" 1080p LCD TV
